originalText.text: In 2022 (July and August)my team and I participated in two pop up shops at Space on Pleasant and felt comfortable immediately. The atmosphere is welcoming. The couple is engaging and is invested in the success of each vendor. The couple checking in with us throughout the entire event to make sure we had everything we needed. We are planning more pop ups in the future at this location. If you are a small business and are interested in doing pop up shop, I recommend this venue. It is a small shop but has everything you need to get started. Check out their Instagram page.

originalText.text: Amazing space to host any event. I was able to host a candle workshop and it was so beautiful. Nicole guide me thru the process and add it to the vision with a beautiful sound bowl session. Love it. Will definitely booked again.

text.text: Amazing space to host any event. I was able to host a candle workshop and it was so beautiful. Nicole guide me thru the process and add it to the vision with a beautiful sound bowl session. Love it. Will definitely booked again.

originalText.text: I co-hosted a table during a pop-up shop last month (April 2022) at Space-on-Pleasant. From the moment My Sister and I walked in the door, the vibes received from Nicole and her husband were so humbly felt during our table setting up that I knew it was going to be a blessed day of sales. They're attention to each vendor, as well as those who came in to purchase various products, made it felt like a family gathering, even though most of us did not know each other. The laughter, food and overall love throughout the day made, what I felt, was the best pop-up shop thus far I've participated in. If you're looking for an intimate space to celebrate something special, brunch with your girls, or just to pop-up and shop, SPACE-ON-PLEASANT is the location to book it. ~ What are you waiting for? Go reserve your date. Tell Nicole I sent you :-) Thank me later XOXO

originalText.text: Space on pleasant is a wonderful spot I have been doing Pop-up here since last year!! The owners are  super dope! Love that they have events for adults and always children.
